resources.string: Use a turn to move one of your ships
If you tap one of your ships it will sink as well as the enemy\'s ship in the same square if there is one
Use this turn to move one of your ships
"Tap one of your ships to select the ship which to send a torpedo from then tap one of the yellow squares, torpedoes only go through %s squares"
Tap one your ships to find out if there are enemy ships round there.
Tap anywhere on the board including your own ships, but if you do that, your ship sinks too
Tap somewhere to bombard the area, you only get one shot of Bombardment so make sure you choose widely
Use a turn to make your ships invisible to the enemy\'s radar, your ships can still get hit.
